## Climbing Progress
```{r, echo=FALSE}
climb <- df %>%
  select(Date, Grade, Flash, Zone) %>%
  filter(!is.na(Flash))
  
par(mfrow=c(1,2))
ggplot(data=climb) +
  geom_point(aes(x=Date, y=Grade, col=Flash)) +
  labs(title='Sends by Flash')

ggplot(data=climb) +
  geom_point(aes(x=Date, y=Grade, col=Zone)) +
  labs(title='Sends by Zone')
```
